title: In-Depth Mathematics Concept Course Through Indirect Failure-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Concept acquisition through observing diverse problem-solving attempts by virtual learners in VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various error cases observed through VR simulations and accurately explain core principles of mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy
After indirect failure learning experiences, learners can apply correct concepts to new problems with over 70% accuracy
Learners can compare and analyze peer problem-solving attempts to derive at least three optimal solution strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
